heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_ember_spirit
heroes.bio_loc:
悲叹山脉中无人问津的角落里，有一座荒废已久的光火堡。堡内演武堂已经空无一人，校场里满是落叶和灰尘。门窗禁闭的光火殿里放着一口玉石大釜，装满了灰烬，这是当年战争诗人——炘的火葬之地。炘培养了整整三代卫火盟的弟子，从修身养性的真经，到强身健体的武艺，炘悉心教导在堡外闯荡所需的一切本领。

然而，作为众多弟子的师傅，他也不得不对付弟子在外惹来的敌人。在炘的暮年，他不敌对手，惨遭兵解。堡内的弟子在此后也奔走各方。一晃之间，数十年乃至数百年转瞬而过，弟子们不断地开枝散叶，而他的教义在口口相传之下慢慢地消逝。后来燃烧天神，一位好学的火神，被他传承的师德所打动，下凡来到了光火堡，重新点燃了灰烬。闪耀的余烬之中，炘的脸庞慢慢浮现，火焰环绕之下他显得格外沉静。为了让知识之火得以燎原，为了让寻求指引的世人接受教导，他已准备就绪。
heroes.hype_loc: 身手矫捷，飘忽不定；出手迅速，无人幸免；阳炎长索，破阵缚敌；爆裂残像，瞬息飞至；烬灵之焰，难捕难防。

abilities.name: ember_spirit_searing_chains
abilities.desc_loc: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.
abilities.lore_loc: Xin's harshest lessons often employed the use of red-hot chains.
notes_loc: Targets are chosen randomly around Xin.
Does not affect Debuff Immune or invisible units.
facets_loc: Searing Chains can affect an additional enemy. When Searing Chains are cast, they are also cast around each Fire Remnant.

abilities.name: ember_spirit_sleight_of_fist
abilities.desc_loc: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location.  Deals bonus damage to heroes.
abilities.lore_loc: The studied warrior must whip and weave through its enemies, burning each without pause.
notes_loc: Targets are determined when the spell is cast.
A regular attack is done to each target every %attack_interval% seconds.
Any attack modifier that Xin has (such as Critical Strike, Bash, Cleave, or Orb effects) will be applied normally on these attacks.
Abilities and items can be used while Sleight of Fist is active.
facets_loc: When Sleight of Fist connects with %min_enemies_for_double_sleight% or more enemies, the enemy closest to Ember Spirit will be attacked a second time. Damage for the second attack is reduced by %second_attack_damage_penalty%%%.

abilities.name: ember_spirit_flame_guard
abilities.desc_loc: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, absorbing a percentage of the damage taken. Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active. If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.
abilities.lore_loc: An enemy should never be allowed to approach without difficulty.
notes_loc: Magic damage reduction is calculated before any reductions.
The damage lingers for an additional %linger_duration% seconds after application.

abilities.name: ember_spirit_activate_fire_remnant
abilities.desc_loc: Select the Fire Remnant to arrive at.
abilities.lore_loc: With blazing speed does a spirit fly!

abilities.name: ember_spirit_immolation
abilities.desc_loc: Ember Spirit is continuously burning, dealing damage per second to all nearby enemies at all times.
notes_loc: Break does not disable Immolation for Fire Remnants when upgraded with Aghanim's Shard.
abilities.shard_loc: Grants Fire Remnants the current level of Immolation, and increases the damage and radius.

abilities.name: ember_spirit_fire_remnant
abilities.desc_loc: Sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at %speed_multiplier%%% Ember Spirit's speed.  Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit will dash out to all active Fire Remnants, destroying them and dealing damage in an area and then moving to the nearest Remnant.  Ember Spirit will end at the Remnant closest to the targeted location.
abilities.lore_loc: By the spirit's power are Xin's teachings spread anew.
abilities.shard_loc: If an enemy hero dies near Ember Spirit, a Fire Remnant charge will be replenished.
abilities.scepter_loc: Increases cast range, initial remnant speed, and maximum charges.

facets.description_loc: Sleight of Fist hits one of its targets an extra time.
facets.name: ember_spirit_double_impact

facets.description_loc: Searing Chains can affect an additional enemy. When Searing Chains are cast, they are also cast around each Fire Remnant.
facets.name: ember_spirit_chain_gang

new_abilities.name: ember_spirit_immolation
new_abilities.desc_loc: Ember Spirit is continuously burning, dealing damage per second to all nearby enemies at all times.
notes_loc: Break does not disable Immolation for Fire Remnants when upgraded with Aghanim's Shard.
new_abilities.shard_loc: Grants Fire Remnants the current level of Immolation, and increases the damage and radius.
